COMMENT: DMR Cache MSCOD Decoding - Used for both CCF/LLC (Bank 6) and SCA (Bank 14)
ARCHITECTURE_NOTE: LLC is part of CCF in Bank 6. SCA (Bank 14) is IO Caching Agent for UIO devices, not system LLC.

ERROR_DESCRIPTIONS.7: LLC data array correctable ECC error
ERROR_DESCRIPTIONS.17: LLC tag array correctable ECC error
ERROR_DESCRIPTIONS.33: LSF (Local Snoop Filter) tag uncorrectable error
ERROR_DESCRIPTIONS.57: RSF (Remote Snoop Filter) state correctable error

NOTES.CCF_LLC: System LLC is part of CCF (Bank 6), containing 32 CBO instances across 4 ENVs
NOTES.SCA: SCA (Scalable Caching Agent) = IOCA (IO Caching Agent) in Bank 14
NOTES.SCA_PURPOSE: SCA provides IO-specific caching for UIO devices (Gen6, CXL, etc.), NOT system LLC
NOTES.SCA_INSTANCES: 8 SCA instances per DMR iMH, 2 IMHs total = 16 SCA instances
NOTES.SCA_PERFORMANCE: Independent tag/data pipelines provide 32B/c throughput vs 11B/c in Gen3 CHA
NOTES.BANK_6: CCF Bank 6 contains LLC + CHA functionality
NOTES.BANK_14: SCA Bank 14 for UIO device caching
NOTES.ECC: Uses DECTED (Double Error Correction, Triple Error Detection) ECC
NOTES.LSF: Local Snoop Filter - part of cache hierarchy
NOTES.RSF: Remote Snoop Filter - for cross-die coherency
NOTES.TWOLM: Two-Level Memory support for persistent memory technologies
